fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.interfaces

Interface SimulationManagementCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.SimulationManagementI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SimulatorPluginManagementCI, SupervisorPluginManagementCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSimulationManagementConnector, AbstractSimulationManagementInboundPort, AbstractSimulationManagementOutboundPort, SimulatorPluginManagementConnector, SimulatorPluginManagementInboundPort, SimulatorPluginManagementOutboundPort, SupervisorPluginManagementConnector, SupervisorPluginManagementInboundPort, SupervisorPluginManagementOutboundPort

    public interface SimulationManagementCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.SimulationManagementI
    The component interface SimulationManagementCI declares the methods used by simulation engines to manage simulation runs.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2018-06-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
